metadata.title: CVE-2016-4579 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Libksba before 1.3.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(out-of-bounds read and crash) via unspecified vectors, related to the"returned length of the object from _ksba_ber_parse_tl."

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4579` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libksba8 - 1.3.3-1ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libksba package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.3-1ubuntu0.16.04.1').
